questions.question: What is the worst-case time complexity of QuickSort?

What is the time complexity of accessing an element in a singly linked list by index?
Which of the following statements about printf and scanf functions is true?
options: A) scanf does not require the address-of operator for char arrays
C) printf can be used without #include <stdio.h>
D) scanf can be used to read entire lines of text
C) 100 followed by a segmentation fault

questions.question:
What will be the output of the following code?

```python
my_list = [10, 20, 30, 40]
for i in range(len(my_list)):
print(my_list[i], end=' ')
```

What will be the output of the following code?

```python
my_tuple = (1, 2, 3, 4)
print(my_tuple[1:3])
```

What will be the output of the following code?

```python
my_dict = {'a': 10, 'b': 20, 'c': 30}
print(my_dict.get('d', 40))
```

What will be the output of the following code?

python
n = 5
for i in range(n):
    for j in range(i + 1):
        print('*', end=' ')
    print()
What is the size of an int data type in C on a 32-bit system?
options: D) Size varies based on the compiler
D) Error due to overwriting in union
